summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2019 NORTHWOOD ARCTIC FOX RV CONNECTED TO A 2015 CHEVROLET SILVERADO 2500 HD. THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT THERE WAS A BURNING ODOR COMING  FROM INSIDE OF THE RV AND NOTICED THAT THE POWER PANEL WAS MELTING. THE RV WAS TAKEN TO KELLY RV INC 60 OLD RTE 15, NEW COLUMBIA, PA 17856 WHERE THEY INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THE ELECTRIC PANEL NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED HOWEVER, SOME OF THE PARTS IN THE PANEL WAS NOT REPAIRABLE.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN.
